snippet: Terrorists in Yemen planned to smuggle an experimental bomb aboard an airliner bound for the United States.
abstract: Intelligence officials say Central Intelligence Agency, working closely with foreign partners, thwarted plot by the Yemeni branch of Al Qaeda to smuggle an experimental bomb aboard an airliner bound for the United States.

byline.original: By SCOTT SHANE and ERIC SCHMITT
byline.contributor: Michael S. Schmidt and John H. Cushman Jr. contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Terrorists in Yemen planned to smuggle an experimental bomb aboard an airliner bound for the United States.

headline.seo: Qaeda Plot to Attack Plane Foiled, U.S. Officials Say
headline.main: Qaeda Plot to Attack Plane Foiled, U.S. Officials Say
headline.print_headline: Qaeda Foiled in Plot to Plant Redesigned Bomb on Plane, U.S. Officials Say
